call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain (EDIT) - Community Chat - September 11th

decisions.decision: Odi took over the Sigmanauts Twitter account
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.context: The account had been dormant and needed new management
decisions.quote: He just took over the Sigmanauts Twitter. So hopefully we see some activity back out of that Twitter. It's been dormant for a little bit.

decisions.decision: GitCircles agreed to use Ergo addresses instead of secp256k1
decisions.speaker: kushti
decisions.context: Technical implementation decision for GitCircles project
decisions.quote: You've agreed to use Ergo addresses instead of secp256k1 and WishYouBalance is improving implementation.

decisions.decision: Next target is to infra the ergoplatform.org website completely
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.context: To save costs from Google hosting charges to the EF
decisions.quote: I think the next target is to infra the ergoplatform.org website completely, ergoplatform.com, simply because Google charges us right up the ass for hosting.

decisions.decision: Will integrate GoFundMe side payments into next Ergo Raffle
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.context: To improve accessibility for fiat users wanting to participate
decisions.quote: I think I'll integrate that into at least the tech side of the Next Ergo Raffle that the SIGs do is do a side GoFundMe for it for fiat users.

commitments.commitment: Ship infra machines that are boxed up in car
commitments.quote: But infra machines are in the back of my car, all boxed up that I showed you last week, and ready to be shipped out. I just have to swing by USPS on the way home today, tomorrow, Friday.

commitments.commitment: Post text in main Telegram chat after the call
commitments.quote: composing some text also will post in the main Telegram chat just after the call

commitments.commitment: Start testing and creating tokens manually in few days for GitCircles
commitments.quote: And yeah, so we will start testing, creating well, talking manually and doing some testing transactions manually also, just like few days.

commitments.commitment: Announce first two speakers for Colorado meetup today or tomorrow
commitments.quote: I'm going to announce the first two speakers. I'll announce maybe today or tomorrow, the third speaker

open_questions.question: Whether GitCircles could implement DAO integration for automated GitHub PR execution
open_questions.context: Discussion about governance in open source communities

open_questions.question: Whether HodlCoin VoltPay supports Apple Pay
open_questions.context: Discussion about payment accessibility for raffles

key_facts.fact: DevNet has blocks every 30 seconds and 60 sub-blocks per block, meaning two sub-blocks a second
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Ergo protocol 6.0 changes reviewed in Node, PR made with minor improvements
key_facts.speaker: kushti (via qx() reading dev update)

key_facts.fact: Colorado meetup is October 11th (Saturday) with Friday arrivals and Sunday breakfast
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Cardano paid an influencer $40,000 to promote SNEK
key_facts.speaker: qx()
